items.sentence: I don\'t know when Tom called, but it was either yesterday or the day before.
Tom has two brothers. One lives in Boston and the other one lives in Chicago.
I wish I could come with you, but I have a test tomorrow and I need to study.
Have you ever noticed that Tom\'s right ear is much larger than his left ear?
I know that it is highly unlikely that we\'ll be able to sell all this stuff.
